titles.title: Federal Property and Administrative Services Authorization Act of 1993
A bill to authorize appropriations under the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 through fiscal year 1995.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2651-2653)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Federal Property and Administrative Services Authorization Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize appropriations for functions and activities under the Act through FY 1996. Elevates the pay levels of the Administrator and Deputy Administrator of the General Services Administration.
